info.title: To invite someone to your project

procedure.step:
&CAWS-console-signin;
Navigate to the project where you want to invite one or more users.

step.para: On the overview page for your project, choose Settings.
On the Members tab, choose Invite.

Type the email addresses of the people you want to invite as users for your project. You can also choose from members of your organization who are not members of the project. When you have finished adding users, choose Send.
